specs.label: Pad Bundle Options
specs.value: Universe Lambskin Perf (installed); Caldera Lambskin Ultra Perf; Auteur Lambskin Perf

specs.label: Includes
specs.value: Cherry Atrium; ZMF Stock Braided Cable; ZMF Universe or Caldera Ultra Perf Earpads (installed); Secondary Earpads; ZMF Owner's Card; ZMF Clamshell Case; Lifetime Driver Warranty

specs.label: Notes
specs.value: Magnesium chassis is painted (not anodized) and may wear over time while shaving 34 g; only one discounted upgrade cable can be purchased per headphone bundle and the stock cable remains included; fully custom cables are available through the ZMF cables page
